alert.note: Alert for Anderson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 2:47PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Anderson County through 330 PM CDT... At 245 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Montalba, or 11 miles north of Palestine, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palestine, Elkhart, Montalba, Brushy Creek, Pert, Crystal Lake, Bois D`arc, Todd City, Neches, Slocum and Broom City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
